vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.2; her mother was Anah (H6034); married to Esau (H6215);
mother of: Jeush (H3266), Jalam (H3281) and Korah (H7141)
§ Aholibamah = "tent of the high place"
1) wife of Esau
2) an Edomite chieftain
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hija de Aná; esposa de Esaú; (b)   jefe de Edom
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
阿何利巴瑪 这个名詞在原文的意思是 "高處之帳篷"
1) 以掃的妻子
2) 一位以東的族長
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
阿何利巴玛 这个名词在原文的意思是 "高处之帐篷"
1) 以扫的妻子
2) 一位以东的族长

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.36.25;
daughter of: Anah (H6034H);
sister of: Dishon (H1787H)
§ Aholibamah = "tent of the high place"
1) wife of Esau
2) an Edomite chieftain

A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.41
§ Aholibamah = "tent of the high place"
1) wife of Esau
2) an Edomite chieftain
